name: Aeronaut: Month 0
description:
IT IS STRONGLY RECOMMENDED TO PLAY THIS GAME IN FULL SCREEN

Aeronaut is a in-development renaissance fantasy flight simulator. You will construct various balloons and explore an open world consisting of many towns dominated by two rival nations. Updates will come monthly or faster.
Aeronauts will become a paid game when it is finished enough and the free version will become the demo version.

This is the month 0 version featuring:
2 Balloons, 2 Villages, 1 Weapon, 2 Birds, 1 Nation, 5 Quests
The ability to buy low and sell high between the two villages based on their economy type.
Birds you can Hunt for food that you can sell.

Planned for the month 1 version:
New map with more villages.
Saving data.
More variations of the Hot Air Balloon.
More building types.
More tools including a spyglass and musket.
